inclusion.criterion: willing and able to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: undergo and comply with all study assessments
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: unequivocal evidence for tumor recurrence or progression by MRI scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: baseline MRI within 24 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tumors must be > 1.0 cm in diameter with upper limit of 5 cm maximal diameter
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: life expectancy of at least 16 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Histology other than astrocytoma grade IV (GBM or gliosarcoma)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Tumor foci detected below the tentorium or beyond the cranial vault
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation.
